meanings.definition: Raised to a higher level or position.
meanings.sent1: The cat climbed to an elevated spot on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The mountain peak is so elevated that it touches the sky.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found an elevated hiding place in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits were elevated after receiving good news.
meanings.sent5: The elevator took us to the most elevated floor of the building.

meanings.sent1: The king lived in an elevated castle.
meanings.sent2: She held an elevated position in the company.
meanings.sent3: The cat acted like an elevated ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were so elevated that they inspired many.
meanings.sent5: The queen's crown symbolized her elevated status.

meanings.sent1: The doctor noticed an elevated temperature in the patient.
meanings.sent2: The city experienced an elevated level of excitement during the festival.
meanings.sent3: The cake had an elevated amount of sugar, making it too sweet.
meanings.sent4: The music reached an elevated volume during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's performance showed an elevated level of skill and determination.
